column4: I'm trying to edit my sources.list but it's telling me I can't for some stupid reason.
Let's say I want to install something that I can't get with the package manager. Does it matter if it's a zip vs. a tar or a gz?
most of the time, .zips are windows
Right, but the page I'm downlading it from says they all contain the same code. Still, I'm assuming a tar/gz would be better in this case then?
